title: 098-99: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely! and False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A detailed review and analysis of Episodes 98-99, discussing the filler content, character moments, and themes. The reviewer describes the episodes as 'average filler' but notes worthwhile moments including Ace's political subtlety and Vivi's diplomatic approach.
